text: Kevin Barry Sullivan (9 September 1922 – 24 January 1972) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile from Collingwood Forever Category:1972 deaths Category:1922 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Kevin Sullivan (footballer)
